task_description:
I would like you to design a landing page for AI startups. The landing page should have a professional and polished appearance, with all content being relevant and adhering to a consistent color palette. Please replicate the design shown in the attached screenshots using your front-end design skills.

Key requirements for the design include:

- Modernized UI/UX with a clean, premium aesthetic.
- Fully responsive layout.
- Clear typographic hierarchy for improved readability and spacing.
- Effective contrast in UI design.
- Simplified elements for clarity.
- Standardized format.
- A modern, classic, professional look with minimalist and elegant features.
- Clean lines and high contrast with generous white space for a balanced aesthetic.
- Beautiful user interface (UI) with interactive animations.
- A well-architected infrastructure.
